title: One Talk app from Verizon. When I get a call, one out of every four will not ring but shows a call
content: One out of every four or five calls won't ring but if you look at phone you see you have a call. Sometimes phone will ring twice then disconnect but desk phone will still be ringing. Anyone have a solution since Verizon tech support is stumped. Appears to be issue with my new pixel 4 xl.
